00033     public class CodeManager
00034     {

00039         private CodeManager()
00040         {
00041             Load();
00042         }
00043         #endregion
00044 
00045         #region Instance of the class
00046         private static CodeManager _Instance = null;
00047         private Dictionary<string, Code> Codes = new Dictionary<string, Code>();
00048 
00052         public static CodeManager Instance
00053         {
00054             get
00055             {
00056                 if (_Instance == null)
00057                 {
00058                     _Instance = new CodeManager();
00059                 }
00060                 return _Instance;
00061             }
00062         }

00069         private void Load()
00070         {
00071             Code Field = new CodeTypes.CodeBase();
00072             this["Subject"]= Field;
00073             this["Comments"]= Field;
00074             this["Content-Description"]= Field;
00075 
00076             Field = new CodeTypes.CodeAddress();
00077             this["From"]= Field;
00078             this["To"]= Field;
00079             this["Resent-To"]= Field;
00080             this["Cc"]= Field;
00081             this["Resent-Cc"]= Field;
00082             this["Bcc"]= Field;
00083             this["Resent-Bcc"]= Field;
00084             this["Reply-To"]= Field;
00085             this["Resent-Reply-To"]= Field;
00086 
00087             Field = new CodeTypes.CodeParameter();
00088             this["Content-Type"]= Field;
00089             this["Content-Disposition"]= Field;
00090 
00091             Field = new Code();
00092             this["7bit"]= Field;
00093             this["8bit"]= Field;
00094 
00095             Field = new CodeTypes.CodeBase64();
00096             this["base64"]= Field;
00097 
00098             Field = new CodeTypes.CodeQP();
00099             this["quoted-printable"]= Field;
00100         }
00101         #endregion
00102

00104 
00105 
00106

00108 
00109         public Code this[string Key]
00110         {
00111             get
00112             {
00113                 Key = Key.ToLower();
00114                 if (Codes.ContainsKey(Key))
00115                 {
00116                     return Codes[Key];
00117                 }
00118                 else
00119                 {
00120                     return null;
00121                 }
00122             }
00123             set
00124             {
00125                 Key = Key.ToLower();
00126                 if (Codes.ContainsKey(Key))
00127                 {
00128                     Codes[Key] = value;
00129                 }
00130                 else
00131                 {
00132                     Codes.Add(Key, value);
00133                 }
00134             }
00135         }
00136         #endregion
00137     }
